description: Electron template generation and validation requirements

requirements.title: Basic Electron template generates correctly
requirements.description: Validates that basic template generates with correct structure: main.ts, preload.ts, package.json, splash.html, tsconfig.json, and assets/

validation.assertion: All template files present and valid

requirements.evidence: API generation endpoint functional, templates/ directory has all files

requirements.title: Advanced Electron template with system tray and shortcuts
requirements.description: Validates advanced template includes system tray, global shortcuts, and background operation features

validation.assertion: Advanced features present in generated main.ts

requirements.evidence: templates/advanced/advanced-app.json exists, main.ts has tray/shortcuts code

requirements.title: Multi-window template with window management
requirements.description: Validates multi-window template supports multiple BrowserWindow instances and inter-window communication

requirements.title: Kiosk template with fullscreen and security hardening
requirements.description: Validates kiosk template includes fullscreen mode, security hardening, and auto-restart capabilities

requirements.title: Electron framework fully supported
requirements.description: Electron framework is the primary and fully-supported desktop framework

validation.assertion: All Electron templates available via API

requirements.evidence: All 4 Electron templates functional (business test 5/5 passing)

requirements.title: Tauri framework support (Rust-based)
requirements.description: Tauri provides smaller binaries and better performance using Rust and native webviews

validation.assertion: Tauri templates generate and build successfully

requirements.notes: Marked as future enhancement. Requires Rust toolchain and different template structure.

requirements.title: Neutralino framework support (lightweight alternative)
requirements.description: Neutralino provides ultra-lightweight desktop apps using native OS APIs

validation.assertion: Neutralino templates generate and build successfully

requirements.notes: Marked as future enhancement. Less common framework, lower priority.
